review: One of the MUST See Attractions if you are visiting Dehradun or Mussoorie . Great passage like entering to a cave with knee level water with mountains both sides have a glamour of a bit of Sunshine ,Dark , water drops showering at places taking you to small waterfalls. Great place to visit in summers. Don't forget Maggie & Tea....

title: picknic spot
review: a picknick spot made filthy by people visiting, don't be surprised if you see people taking a bath with soap and shampoo.

title: Over rated and full of filth
review: The place is simply overrated. Overcrowded with people, this place has no scenic beauty and moreover too much filth all around due to the local people bathing.

title: Nothing great about the place
review: Nothing good about this place. It just a small stream coming from somewhere inside the cave. You can just take a walk, click some pics and that's it. Would not recommend this place for Family outings.

title: Make an early trip
review: Robbers cave is located in Gucchupani and Auto fare is around 250 one way from most places. River Tons has a long course through the Rocks/ Cave. he width is pretty narrow at places. If you want to explore the place in comfort, reach the place by 8 in the morning so that by he time the rush starts by noon, you are on your way back. carry a flash light with you. decent snacks are served by the stalls in the area. Avoid if you are claustrophobic. Wear slippers and something light. (avoid Denims) and carry an extra pair of clothing.

title: Not That Worthy !!!!!!!!
review: It would have been an amazing place in past. In present days, it is just another place. Full of filth.

title: Perfect place in the midst of nature
review: One would defiantly like this place who loves nature. The walk through the cave, the shades of rocks on the walls of cave and the feel that you will get is unforgettable.

title: was not that exciting
review: very crowded and met with some hooligans.  Children did not feel happy about the place and came back complaining about the locals there.  For the all the hype we received the place was not well maintained.

title: simply beautiful
review: simply beautiful place, a must visit when u r in dehradun especially if u r a nature lover, the try the moms n maggie sitting in the stream (this u will only understand once u get there) ;)

title: A hidden gem!
review: I went here on a sunday and hence this place was completely crowded. Yet the experience was a lot of fun and I would definitely recommend it to other people as well. The crowd can be a put off but the experience of wading through water ( below knee level) through caves is an experience one cannot get anywhere else. The water is surprisingly clean since its running water. Do not forget to enjoy a bowl of maggi sitting at a table set in the middle of the small stream!

title: It's a cave
review: It's a cave wherein Alaknanda river flows. The cave is said to be 2 km deep. If you are young going with friends and know how to swim u can njoy the beauty. It's less maintained, moderately hygienic. If u r a couple avoid cos it's no fun and adventure. Badly maintained and partially dirty.

title: In the nature's lap
review: Quite A place to visit in dehradun... The flow of river and the surrounding natural beuty leaves you speechless... Gud place to hike or for a family picnic... Although not a lot of restaurants around but you can take food from home itself and eat in the nature's shade ...

title: Between The mountains water stream
review: Not a place for Old people, handicapped, physically disable. Please carry water proof/ antiskit  sandals, The water would be up to knee in passage way, however the first water fall pool is 5.5 ft, if u have stamina the climb up the mountain, the second water fall pool would be 4 ft deep, this is best one, The entry fees is 20 per head, and parking fee is Rs10 per bike, I would recommend not to carry bags as there is poor locker facility.

title: amazing jewel
review: great ambience specially for kids to wade in the water in a cave, go early morning to avoid the hoards, but tourists have left it so filthy with diapers, and all sorts of rubbish hope the administration imposes strict fines for such things so that we can preserve what is so beautiful even the restaurants around are shabby you do not feel like eating there.

title: Kids will love it
review: Beautiful location, walk in flowing river streams and amongst mountain rocks.. Kids will love the thrilling walk  , there is a waterfall where you can get drenched if you want..remember to always carry your swimming trunks and water proof sandals here and in any journey...never know when you will need them

title: CAVE WITH WATER TILL WAIST HEIGHT
review: Believe me this 200 m cave will give you adventure,enjoyment and fun.water is near knee level at entry of cave but reaches waist line in middle with little showers coming from top...we had wonderful experience...for water pool you have to climb mountains ideally for youngsters....not place for old age and handicapped person

title: Heaven
review: Its an Amazing Place , A Must Visit Place in Dheradun.

title: Beautiful cave but not very clean
review: This is an amazing place, a rock face eroded by water, demonstrating the power of nature. One has to walk into the cave which initially has a about one foot water. But as you go deeper into the cave, it narrows down with the water reaching about 3 feet. Finally it widens into a water fall with a pool which could be more than 5 feet deep.

title: Nice place
review: Not a very good approach road but a nice place to visit, u can get small eating points inside and a scenic view, can enoy it as a natural water park

title: Enjoy waterfall on a daily basis
review: Robbers cave is walking distance from Rio Resort and you can enjoy waterfall on daily basis.

title: lovely scenic beauty...must visit
review: its a beautiful place to visit, now cars can reach to the nearest place and you have to pay entry tickets for this, which was not there previously, lot of natural beauty has been destroyed out of the cave .... and business establishments have been open .... but still inside beauty is still untouched,  you enjoy the waterfall and the beauty of the cave from inside......

title: childhood memories
review: love the place,brought back so many childhood memories, we use to go there when in school with friends on bikes. visiting this time it was so nostalgic.

title: Waste of going there
review: robbers cave is waste.. Its not clean ... Earlier it was for theives to hide their stuff..  Overall its not safe place to wander around

title: Surprise package!!
review: We just went out site seeing in Dehradun with little hopes. However, the visit to Robber's cave was exciting..! We had a good time at the waterfall and the route by the cave..! Would recomend that if passing through Dehradun - do spare some time to visit this place!!

title: Lifetime Experience! Don't Miss it....
review: This a awesome place don't miss it. We just went out site seeing in Dehradun, We didn't know this place earlier. Strongly recommended. Love this place...

title: Guchu - Paani
review: Hi,

title: Good place to go with friends.
review: Good place to go with friends. Its a beautiful cave with a small river flowing through. Inside there is a waterfall and a small pool.

title: Wonderful Feeling of Adventure
review: I really feel the adventure in this cave where one can have bathe and see the origin of a small river. The water is good for enjoying and the rock gives one an opportunity for adventure.

title: Amazing place
review: If you are with your family anf freinds this is a must place to visit. The best time to visit this place is between Jan and Mar when the crowd is less and you get more of privacy there as the cave is confined and its difficult to fit a lot of people in. In other seasons you might have to stand in a que when approx. 1500 people visit in that place in a day. You might easily miss this visit is you dont refer TripAdvisor. The water flows at a good speed. If you like boozing, you can take a couple of cans inside the cave and enjoy it in the natural pool created inside. And make sure you reach the place by 3pm so that its not drak inside when you are entering the cave. A couple of hours are enough to enjoy this place. Even they have chairs layed in the water outside the cave where you can enjoy your snacks.

title: Awsem place
review: A must go place in INDIA.

title: Masti
review: The place is nice, no life guards thoughs but you can't complain when u pay mere 15 rs fee.

title: A picnic spot
review: As a youngster in school Robbers Cave was worth a visit as a place of mystery and good rocks to climb. But the influx of visitors has caused it to be full of rubbish and plastic bags. But one can still find a plave along the rapid flowing stream for a picnic.

title: Must visit place if u r adventurous
review: ... Ah. This is a place one should visit because the natural beauty here is breathtaking u'll enjoy the place if u r sporting as well it is heaven for water loving people and you could have a great picnic outing here I recommend this place and I take guarantee that u guys. Will love this place and never forget this place. Must must must visit

title: A mini adventure for the family
review: Hire a cab or have ur own conveyance, no public transportation. A lovely site but very poorly maintained even with an entry ticket. Indiscriminate licenses/encroachments for small shops/eateries, poor waste management etc have really polluted the water, but the cave is long and wide enough with a water fall at the end. Suggested attire is shorts and T shirt with flip-flops (also available on hire). Children really enjoyed as did the elders, definitely a small family adventure.

title: Lap of nature
review: We went there after the rains and there was plenty of water in the stream. We enjoyed walking in water through the caves. But one should not go there after it is dark since we saw some unruly elements there. In fact, thete had been a scuffle and one of the guys was bleeding heavily. Overwise a wonderful place.

title: Robbers Cave: GUCHHU PANI.
review: very good...but went at 6:00PM(bad thing.....)still no light but atleast were able to see something and experience a cooooool weather........

title: robber's cave..must see..
review: It's a mysterious strange place.. Something very rare to experience.. caves between the hills..water flowing touching your feet, should visit this place..

title: Paradise on earth jet privilege  153937615
review: A place where anyone can enjoy. Very beautiful sight within the water and mountains. it is the best place to visit in summer days . All is cool there . A perfect place for groups, couples and families to enjoy. Perfect place for picnics, and the pools nearby are very good for relaxation.

title: You have to walk into the cave ......
review: this is one very interesting and beautiful place.. decieving as well , just at the face of it it just seems like a small stream coming out from cave like hills. but then you actually enter into the cave walking through the water some times shallow some times waist deep, and narrow cave , its thrilling thoroughly enjoyable. not very adventurous though at the end, but the thrill and fun is in the anticipation of it , and you althrough have that.

title: Anup Tea House
review: Never forget to have tea and snacks at Anup Tea House natural air condition home.This is the first ever tea house just on the left side of the cave when you enter.He would serve you a natural mineral water which he collects within his own place and carry at home.

title: Very Poor environment
review: If you have some female friends then do not prefer this place. Yes it's a cool place but no any security is there. Any misshapen or eve teasing can happen there

title: Mesmerizing!!
review: Not very well known, but an amazing place to visit in Dehradun. Natives call it Guchipani and this is located at the cantonment area of Dehradun. Knee deep water flows from a waterfall at the other end of the cave and gives you a heavenly feeling. Would probably avoid the place on weekends because it was a little crowded even on weekdays, so I imagine it would be worse on weekends. Carry a pair of slippers with you or you can rent a pair as you enter the cave for Rs. 5. There is a toilet if you want to change. Try to visit the cave late in the afternoon between 3 and 6 PM. You get some good maggi and omelette from the shops at the entrance with some other snacks. The peak season is May to July, so if you are going to visit the caves during this period you can expect it to be crowded.

title: Great but Forbidding
review: Also known as Guchhipani, the Robber's Cave is known for its pristine beauty and as a challenge to the adventure hungry. The moment we entered the surroundings engulfed by hills on all the sides, we were fascinated by the gently flowing river whose banks provided an ideal picnic spot. The grassy banks, the murmuring stream provided an ideal place for relaxation. We were jolted from the reverie when we were told that we should hire rubber shoes and enter the river which will take us through the caves and make us invisible for sometime. Being old, we were scared as the stones could be slippery and this discouraged us from taking the plunge. and we did the right thing. The youngsters coming out of the cave were very excited and thrilled but they told us that we had done the right thing. We had no regret as still, the experience was worthwhile.

title: Cool place to visit!
review: The rocks structure of the cave is wonderful and unique, water is cool and perfect for summers!!! One can go through the cave and visit that beautiful, small and enjoyable fall Perfect for couples with kidz and family. Perfect for summers, a bit too cold for winters.

title: Best place in Dehradun
review: Awesome place to visit during summers as it would be a bit cold in winters due to the waterfall. We had lot of fun there in our group of 12 people. Carry a pair of floaters or you can rent a pair as you enter the cave. The best place to visit the cave is 3-6 pm.

title: Awesome place
review: It's a very small and very nice place. I wasn't expecting somthing so different.water was super clean .inside it was cold.It's a very small place but then its a small passage between the big boulders .its just different and in a good way.You don't know from outside that how it is in the small cave like thing  till you go in.In all it was worth going there .

title: Indeed - Robbers Cave
review: Known as Gucchu Pani,A must visit place.Good experience in walking down the cave with ankle deep water which ultimately opens up into a fall.

title: Good spot, but no facilities for tourists
review: Good cave with natural water flowing all 12 months. Cool Place to visit and enjoy. There is a ticket for entry and on the other hand no facilities for tourist. Place was not clean. There was no control on young tourist enjoying there picnic with beer bottles in their hand. Tourist with families and young couples finds it difficult to enter this place particularly in off seasons as there is no security provided. Can be made perfect tourist spot with maximum amenities, security and proper beautification of the place.

title: Must visit destination
review: It's popularly known as Guchhu Pani. We faced great problems to get there with the name Robber's Cave. A beautiful and thrilling place to visit in the lap of nature. A narrow cave of about 500 m that ends with a waterfall.

title: A Good place to see.
review: Reaching this place is difficult. There are no maps showing how to reach it. Further hardly anyone can recall ROBBER"S CAVE. Those who know this place know by its local name--GUCHHU PANI.

title: Not the entire truth
review: Well, very few books and websites tell you that only maybe very fit and energetic people can make it to the actual place where the stream disappears and resurfaces - as there are slippery rocks to climb before we reach there - so elderly and children are out of question

title: Nice place
review: Nice place to hangout at summer time only not good food services available but as per my experience i enjoyed a lot with friends.

title: Families should avoid
review: Nice place for picnic and outing. Unfortunately the place is not safe for families and women groups. The graffiti  inside the cave or gorge and the looks in the eyes of the all male picnickers makes you uneasy if you are visiting with family.

title: A good place to visit in dehradun.
review: a very good place to visit in dehradun  away from the chaos of Rajpura road , the stream there in robber's cave is so pure and clean that u can feel it just by toching it.

title: robbers gateway
review: amazingly carved by the water,almost one km long like tunnel narrow passage with a knee high water interesting story of this place worth to visit while in dehradun.

title: An Interesting and adventureous experience
review: We visited the place in Dec 12 and found the place enthralling with adventure and wonderfully maintained. A lovely tourist place, must visit if you are visiting the city. Beware of monkeys and local guides. both are cheats .LOL.

title: Sour Experience!
review: Went there with a friend....its an amazing place but the crowd is pathetic!

title: Super duper place....
review: Gr8 place to visit in Dehradun....Robber's cave is also known as Gucchu paani in Dehradun... Any body can visit Gucchu paani through buses from Dehradun Bus stand (local buses) & then small walk of about 10-15 minutes.

title: Amazing
review: Very beautiful place, calm and composed one good for spending some quality time with loved ones also full of adventure for those who love it.

title: Excellent hill-way
review: This location is outside Dehradun. Robber's cave or local name Guchchu paani is small hill way between two very close hills. Water flows from one cave which is around 200 meters inside from the opening of both the hills. Its nice experience to walk against water flow towards the cave. Feeling of cold water to feet is excellent and cannot be forgot. Water is very clean and its level is just to immerse the feet inside water. Its different than to walk in sea shore as the sea water is warmer always. Hills around add excitement in journey. Main cave is having fast water flow coming out and hence we avoided to go nearer. small snacks restaurant is available in opening where you can experience hot tea with feet immersed in cold water. It is different experience and worth watch. Local people say that robbers used to hide here due to difficult terrain.

title: Good Experiance
review: Even though People go there for fun, a walk in cave. filled with fresh spring water and exciting Place. I went to find out some wildlife and get Two Himalayan owls there so my adventure was successful. kid and young will enjoy this place. 2-3 hour is enough for this location

title: Nice getaway
review: Had gone driving to Dehradun-Mussorie-Haridwar and back from Delhi in the summers, and found this small nature's paradise nestled a few kilometers from the heart of the city. Even in peak summers the place was amazingly cool with water dripping from doth sides of the rockface as you walk between then in a small stream.
